body:
<!-- **Are you in the right place?**
1. For issues or feature requests, please create an issue in this repository.
2. For general technical and non-technical questions, we are happy to help you on our [Rook.io Slack](https://slack.rook.io/).
3. Did you already search the existing open issues for anything similar? -->

**Is this a bug report or feature request?**
* Bug Report

**Deviation from expected behavior:**
OSD got created and immediately terminated.

**Expected behavior:**
OSD once created should not be terminated immediately after creation.

**How to reproduce it (minimal and precise):**
<!-- Please let us know any circumstances for reproduction of your bug. -->
Deploy rook/ceph:master on OCP 4.1. Create a ceph cluster and add disk after that.

**File(s) to submit**:

* Cluster CR (custom ressource), typically called `cluster.yaml`, if necessary
* Operator's logs, if necessary
``` 2019-07-24 14:32:46.037192 I | op-osd: starting 0 osd daemons on node ip-10-0-154-87 2019-07-24 14:32:46.817564 I | op-osd: osd orchestration status for node ip-10-0-173-96 is computingDiff 2019-07-24 14:32:46.860323 I | op-osd: osd orchestration status for node ip-10-0-173-96 is orchestrating 2019-07-24 14:32:47.692036 I | op-osd: osd orchestration status for node ip-10-0-173-96 is completed 2019-07-24 14:32:47.692062 I | op-osd: starting 0 osd daemons on node ip-10-0-173-96 2019-07-24 14:33:04.468759 I | op-osd: osd orchestration status for node ip-10-0-138-2 is completed 2019-07-24 14:33:04.468784 I | op-osd: starting 1 osd daemons on node ip-10-0-138-2 2019-07-24 14:33:04.487880 I | op-osd: started deployment for osd 0 (dir=false, type=) 2019-07-24 14:33:04.495679 I | op-osd: 3/3 node(s) completed osd provisioning 2019-07-24 14:33:04.495747 I | op-osd: checking if any nodes were removed 2019-07-24 14:33:04.515317 I | op-osd: processing 0 removed nodes 2019-07-24 14:33:04.515338 I | op-osd: done processing removed nodes 2019-07-24 14:33:04.515357 I | exec: Running command: ceph versions --connect-timeout=15 --cluster=openshift-storage --conf=/var/lib/rook/openshift-storage/openshift-storage.config --keyring=/var/lib/rook/openshift-storage/client.admin.keyring 2019-07-24 14:33:05.902851 I | op-osd: completed running osds in namespace openshift-storage 2019-07-24 14:33:05.902901 I | rbd-mirror: configure rbd-mirroring with 0 workers 2019-07-24 14:33:05.909079 I | rbd-mirror: no extra daemons to remove 2019-07-24 14:33:05.909098 I | op-cluster: Done creating rook instance in namespace openshift-storage 2019-07-24 14:33:06.175036 I | op-osd: osd.0 is marked 'DOWN' 2019-07-24 14:33:06.175165 I | exec: Running command: ceph osd safe-to-destroy 0 --connect-timeout=15 --cluster=openshift-storage --conf=/var/lib/rook/openshift-storage/openshift-storage.config --keyring=/var/lib/rook/openshift-storage/client.admin.keyring --format json --out-file /tmp/056501664 2019-07-24 14:33:06.650451 I | op-osd: osd.0 is 'safe-to-destroy' 2019-07-24 14:33:06.657487 I | op-k8sutil: removing deployment rook-ceph-osd-0 if it exists 2019-07-24 14:33:06.670869 I | op-k8sutil: Removed deployment rook-ceph-osd-0 2019-07-24 14:33:06.678753 I | op-k8sutil: rook-ceph-osd-0 still found. waiting... 2019-07-24 14:33:08.844663 I | op-k8sutil: rook-ceph-osd-0 still found. waiting... 2019-07-24 14:33:10.857051 I | op-k8sutil: rook-ceph-osd-0 still found. waiting... 2019-07-24 14:33:12.862797 I | op-k8sutil: confirmed rook-ceph-osd-0 does not exist W0724 14:37:25.000912 6 reflector.go:289] github.com/rook/rook/pkg/operator/ceph/cluster/controller.go:159: watch of *v1.ConfigMap ended with: too old resource version: 150299 (154420) 2019-07-24 14:37:26.003235 I | op-cluster: device lists are equal. skipping orchestration 2019-07-24 14:37:26.003358 I | op-cluster: device lists are equal. skipping orchestration 2019-07-24 14:37:26.003525 I | op-cluster: device lists are equal. skipping orchestration 2019-07-24 14:38:13.408001 I | op-osd: osd.0 is marked 'DOWN' 2019-07-24 14:38:13.408126 I | exec: Running command: ceph osd safe-to-destroy 0 --connect-timeout=15 --cluster=openshift-storage --conf=/var/lib/rook/openshift-storage/openshift-storage.config --keyring=/var/lib/rook/openshift-storage/client.admin.keyring --format json --out-file /tmp/340746126 2019-07-24 14:38:13.854989 I | op-osd: osd.0 is 'safe-to-destroy' ```
* Crashing pod(s) logs, if necessary

 To get logs, use `kubectl -n <namespace> logs <pod name>`
When pasting logs, always surround them with backticks or use the `insert code` button from the Github UI.
Read [Github documentation if you need help](https://help.github.com/en/articles/creating-and-highlighting-code-blocks).

**Environment**:
* OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
* Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
* Cloud provider or hardware configuration:
* Rook version (use `rook version` inside of a Rook Pod):
* Storage backend version (e.g. for ceph do `ceph -v`):
* Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
* Kubernetes cluster type (e.g. Tectonic, GKE, OpenShift):
* Storage backend status (e.g. for Ceph use `ceph health` in the [Rook Ceph toolbox](https://rook.io/docs/rook/master/ceph-toolbox.html)):
title: OSD Pod marked OUT immediately after creation and cleaned
